inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis diagnosed by either of the following in a patient with chronic liver disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Radiologic evidence of varices, cirrhosis or portal hypertension
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On treatment for hepatic encephalopathy (patient can be on lactulose and rifaximin)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient was given a presumptive diagnosis of hepatic encephalopathy and started on lactulose.

inclusion.criterion: Able to give written, informed consent (demonstrated by mini-mental status exam>25 at the time of consenting)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Liver function tests showed a striking increase in his total and direct bilirubin since last visit.

notes: Patient has cirrhosis, varices, and is on treatment for hepatic encephalopathy. However, MELD score >22 may be a concern.
